entries.source:
Chat Edit: 'Before you go further with this, let me add that the widget should pop up along the left edge of the screen, and for normal alerts, use yellow instead of purple.

Please continue!'

Chat Edit: 'Quickshell cannot load:
ERROR: Failed to load configuration
 ERROR:   caused by @shell.qml[232:13]: Type NotificationCenter unavailable
 ERROR:   caused by @NotificationCenter.qml[48:20]: Non-existent attached object
'

Chat Edit: 'The notification widget is opening on the left side of the screen instead of the right, but this is a great start! The buttons at the top run off the right edge of the window, so that will also need adjustment.'

Chat Edit: 'The notification widget is opening on the left side of the screen instead of the right, but this is a great start! The buttons at the top run off the right edge of the window, so that will also need adjustment.'

Chat Edit: 'It is working now! I noticed that when toggling the DND option in the notifiation widget, the notifications icon on the bar should also show a red bell with slash like the button on the widget, but does not.

Once fixed, can you send a test notification to see if the counter and widget works?'

Chat Edit: 'It is working now! I noticed that when toggling the DND option in the notifiation widget, the notifications icon on the bar should also show a red bell with slash like the button on the widget, but does not.

Once fixed, can you send a test notification to see if the counter and widget works?'

Chat Edit: 'The icon now changes when toggling DND, but the update count does not increase when notifications appear, nor are they shown in the notification list of the widget. Even if a notification is dismissed from the main screen, it should still appear in the notification list. 

The critical notification was persistent on the main screen until I clicked it to dismiss.'

Chat Edit: 'The icon now changes when toggling DND, but the update count does not increase when notifications appear, nor are they shown in the notification list of the widget. Even if a notification is dismissed from the main screen, it should still appear in the notification list. 

The critical notification was persistent on the main screen until I clicked it to dismiss.'

Chat Edit: 'This is sort-of working. 

The notification list only shows one generic notification even though there are supposed to be 5 that says "notification" without any other information. 

Additional notifications did not increase the notification count nor was it added to the listed notifications.

It seems like we're close, but not there yet.'

Chat Edit: 'The test notifications are still not registering on the notifiction counter nor are they persistant in the notification center. Perhaps we should consult with the Caelestia Shell files to see how it handles notifications? If we need to switch away from mako to make this work, I'm willing to work through it.'

Chat Edit: 'There is nothing to indicate that anything is working.'

Chat Edit: 'I am unable to clear notifications now from the notifiation center, either with the X button on the notification or the clear all button at the top.'
